channel.title: ::makeowner
channel.description:
i need 3 codes like ::makeowner [playername] ::makeadmin [playername] ::makemod [playername]
please help me.

item.title: ::makeowner
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“makeadmin”)) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now an Administrator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“makeowner”)) {
String name = command.substring(9);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 3;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a hidden admin");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“makemod”)) {
String name = command.substring(8);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“demote”)) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is no longer a member of staff");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}[/code]

the demote command is very handy

Read full topic
